--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Perndabot/FZ::
>

>

here?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recieving Perndabot's transmission, FZ turns around and heads back 
to 
> the Iron Fist.
